tool_description: Analyzes bird vocalizations and calls to identify species-specific audio patterns and characteristics.

call_type.description: Type of vocalization: song, alarm_call, contact_call, territorial_call

pitch_quality.description: Pitch characteristics: high, medium, low, variable

error_messages: No audio input provided: Supply either audio_file_path or call_description.
Unsupported audio format: Use common formats like MP3, WAV, or M4A.
Invalid call type: Use one of [song, alarm_call, contact_call, territorial_call].
Invalid duration: Duration must be a positive number.
Invalid repetition pattern: Use one of [single, repeated, complex_sequence].
Invalid pitch quality: Use one of [high, medium, low, variable].
usage: Provide audio_file_path or call_description, optionally with call_type, duration_seconds, repetition_pattern, and pitch_quality. Returns audio analysis for species identification.
